thread.title: COMPUTEX Returning 2016 with Two New Areas
thread.title_full: COMPUTEX Returning 2016 with Two New Areas

title: COMPUTEX Returning 2016 with Two New Areas
text: Monday, October 5, 2015 5:32PM IST (12:02PM GMT) COMPUTEX Returning 2016 with Two New Areas Taipei, Taiwan COMPUTEX TAIPEI is coming back 2016 from May 31 st to June 4 th ! Registration for local and overseas exhibitors is now open, and the organizers have already received requests to expand booth spaces from many exhibitors. Space is limited, so prospective exhibitors should hurry. This Smart News Release features multimedia. View the full release here: http://www.businesswire.com/news/home/20151004005098/en/ 2015 COMPUTEX showground (Photo: Business Wire) The focus of COMPUTEX is to reflect to the evolution of the ICT industry and its changes. In recent years, the spotlight has been on the cloud, wearable technology, IoT applications, network devices, and semiconductors, as ICT companies compete for business opportunities in the wake of the Internet of Things (IoT). In 2016, COMPUTEX will debut two new exhibits, SmarTEX and InnoVEX. These two exhibits will focus on networking technology and applications and offer a stage for startups and teams all around the world to display their new ideas and attract international investors. SmarTEX will showcase the 6 major applications of IoT—security, smart home and entertainment, wearable technology, automotive electronics, 3D printing, and smart solutions. Domestic and overseas exhibitors will display trending products. The organizers will also invite global system integration providers to visit this area, which will be located in TWTC Exhibition Hall 1. InnoVEX is designed as a “startup village” in TWTC Exhibition Hall 3. In addition to out-of-the-box, open booths and conference spaces, InnoVEX also features forums, seminars, and business networking to satisfy every startup’s needs, including investor matchmaking. The tiny companies of today may become household brands of the future. COMPUTEX wants to introduce startups to international buyers and venture capitalists. Other areas of the exhibition include Systems & Solutions, Smart Business, and Embedded & Smart Manufacturing. COMPUTEX is the world’s only professional trade show that features a complete ICT supply chain and provides an ideal platform for establishing Internet Computing Ecosystem partnerships. The show draws over 39,000 buyers from all over the world each year to conduct their purchasing in Taiwan. Asian buyers form 76% of the buyers, while the number of Southeast Asian buyers steadily increases each year. As a result, the ICT industry views COMPUTEX as the gateway to the Asian ICT market. For more information about registering for COMPUTEX and other information about the show, please visit the official website: www.ComputexTaipei.com.tw
